titles.title: American Oil for American Families Act of 2018
A bill to ban the exportation of crude oil or refined petroleum products derived from Federal land, and for other purposes.
American Oil for American Families Act of 2018

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary:
American Oil for American Families Act of 2018
This bill prohibits the exportation of petroleum or certain products produced from petroleum if the petroleum was extracted from federal land.
